results.title: Metformin inhibits early stage diethylnitrosamine-induced hepatocarcinogenesis in rats
results.text_hl: The antitumor effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ were increased by the reduction of surface nodules and decreased the incidence of altered hepatocellular foci, @<m>DISEASE_Adenoma_Liver_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018248 @@@hepatocellular adenoma and carcinoma@@@.
